name: ShearShare, Inc.
description: Developer of a business-to-business mobile platform designed to increase empty salon chairs on demand. The company's platform matches salon and barbershop owners with licensed beauty professionals, enabling stylists to find and book working spaces for rent.
one_liner: Developer of a business-to-business mobile platform designed to increase empty salon chairs on demand. The company's platform matches salon and barbershop owners with licensed beauty professionals, enabling stylists to find and book working spaces for rent.
